mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.code as code, a.name as name, b.market as market, b.level as level, b.currency as currency,price,my_avg_price,quantity,convert(value / (select sum(f.value) from futu_data f where f.pl_date = a.pl_date), decimal(4,4)) * 100 as percentage, b.industry as industry,b.sub_industry as sub_industry,tags,update_time,value,pl_value,convert(pl_ratio, decimal(4,4)) * 100 as pl_ratio,pl_date from futu_data a left join category b on a.code=b.code where id = #{id}

select a.id as id, a.code as code, a.name as name, b.market as market, b.level as level, b.currency as currency,price,my_avg_price,quantity,convert(value / (select sum(f.value) from futu_data f where f.pl_date = a.pl_date), decimal(4,4)) * 100 as percentage, b.industry as industry,b.sub_industry as sub_industry,tags,update_time,value,pl_value,convert(pl_ratio, decimal(4,4)) * 100 as pl_ratio,pl_date from futu_data a left join category b on a.code=b.code where pl_date = #{plDate} order by percentage desc
